name: RX Racing 2020 Pro
description:
Rallycross Game

3 Modes : Time Attack , Race and Season ( UK rallycross and SARX )

- Season 2020 of UK Rallycross 10 drivers and 5 tracks

Race with 7-8 cars Season 4 races

- Season 2020 of RNordic 10 drivers 5 teams and 5 tracks

Race with 5-6 cars

- Season 2020 of SARX 7 drivers 2 teams and 2 tracks

Race with 7 cars Season 2 races

- Season 2019 of ARC 9 drivers 3 teams and 4 tracks

Race with 7-8 cars Season 4 races

Only keyboards and mouse

This game includes :

- Fake names
- Fake tracks
- Fake teams
- Fake cars

No licence
